subject: Football
lead_paragraph: One thing was clear as 46 players took part in the first day of the team's rookie minicamp: Sinorice Moss, the smallest player on the field, carried the largest and most immediate burden.
snippet: One thing was clear as 46 players took part in the first day of the team's rookie minicamp: Sinorice Moss, the smallest player on the field, carried the largest and most immediate burden.
